document.masterDocTitle: World Catalogue of the Druid Flies (Diptera: Schizophora: Clusiidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: World Catalogue of the Druid Flies (Diptera: Schizophora: Clusiidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Heterochroa
Schiner 1868 : 236
. Type species,
Heterochroa picta Schiner 1868
[=
philippii Rondani 1863
], by original designation. Gender feminine. Preoccupied by
Heterochroa Boisduval
( Nymphalidae ).
Marschall 1873 : 333
[nomenclator];
Scudder 1884 : 147
[nomenclator];
Schulze et al . 1930
: 1534
[nomenclator];
Czerny 1903 : 98
[as synonym of
Peratochaetus
].

Peratochaetus
. Misspelling of
Peratochetus Rondani
[junior synonym of
Clusia Haliday
], and misapplication of name for three species including
Philippii Rondani
,
pictipennis Wulp
and
ornata Johnson
(now Heleomyzidae ), with type species of
Peratochetus Rondani
( flava Meigen ) treated as
Clusia
.
Czerny 1903 : 92
[synonymy of
Heterochroa Schiner
with
Peratochaetus
];
Aldrich 1905 : 571
[catalogue, North America—only lists ornatus Johnson (currently combined with
Spilochroa Williston
, Heleomyzidae )];
Kertész 1906 : 321
[key];
Malloch 1933 : 234
[ Chile , as synonym of
Alloclusia
- followed by Frey (1960) and Soós (1964a , 1968 )].

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 5. Illustrations of Clusiidae from Czerny (1903), including
Hendelia beckeri Czerny
(figs 1-3),
Apiochaeta philippii (Rondani)
(figs 4, 5) and
Apiochaeta bicolor (Schiner)
(figs 6, 7).
